person.persName: Thomas Rodman (Kentucky dry goods merchant and entrepreneur)

body.p: Kentucky dry goods merchant and entrepreneur. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah E. Rodman. Married to Julia Elizabeth Willoughby Rodman. Father of Mary Rodman, James Rodman, Martha Rodman, Willoughby Rodman, Henrietta Rodman, and Elizabeth "Lizzie" Rodman. Merchant in Henry County in 1850. Founding commissioner of the Henry County Deposit Bank and the Henry County Mutual Insurance Company in 1858. Merchant in New Castle, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in 1860.
